sentences: Merlyn Ray Pohlman (July 22, 1930 â€“ November 1, 1990) was an American session musician and arranger who played both upright bass and bass guitar, and also did sessions as a guitarist.
He is credited with being the first electric bass player in Los Angeles studios in the 1950s.
He was the musical director of the house band, "The Shindogs", on the 1960s television show Shindig!
